parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Extend
parameters.description: Specifies whether fuzzy search by path to the scheduled task is supported. If you want to use fuzzy search, set the parameter to **1**. If you set the parameter to a different value or leave the parameter empty, fuzzy search is not supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or IP address of the server.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The path to the scheduled task.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The username of the account that runs the scheduled task.
